problem_text_cn: 如图,AB是⊙O的弦,OC⊥AB于点D,交⊙O于点C,若半径为5,OD=3,则弦AB的长为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the chord of ⊙O, OC ⊥ AB at point D, and it intersects ⊙O at point C, if the radius is N_0, OD = N_1, then the length of chord AB is ()
raw_answer: 【解答】解:连接AO,∵OC⊥AB,∴D为AB的中点,即AD=BD=\frac{1}{2}AB,在Rt△AOD中,OA=5,OD=3,根据勾股定理得:AD=√{AO²-DO²}=4,则AB=2AD=8．
raw_comment: 此题考查了垂径定理,以及勾股定理,熟练掌握垂径定理是解本题的关键．
